metadata.title: CVE-2021-4009 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before 1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SProcXFixesCreatePointerBarrier function. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to data confidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-4009` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xdmx-tools - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xnest - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xorg-server-source - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xserver-common - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
xvfb - 2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

xwayland - 2:21.1.2-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> xorg server is actually the xorg-server package the xorg package only contains docs xwayland package contains parts of xorg-server This is ZDI-CAN 14950

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.20.13-1ubuntu1.1').
xwayland package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:21.1.2-0ubuntu1.1').
